name: RPG Characters - Pixelliverse
description:
Usage 

  Under CC BY License, you can use and remix these icons for commercial games and projects If you happen to use this pack on a game you end up releasing, i would be delighted if you linked your project on the comments! I'm interested in seeing what people make with this!

32+ RPG Characters!

With normal people, knights and royal people, with this pack you get all you need for an RPG

Format

The pack comes with 8 sprite sheets, with 4 characters on each. These sheets are in .PNG form. Should work with everything that supports spritesheets
